Title: gree/jose - "None" Algorithm treated as valid in tokens
Description: Several widely-used JSON Web Token (JWT) libraries, including node-jsonwebtoken, pyjwt, namshi/jose, php-jwt, and jsjwt, are affected by critical vulnerabilities that could allow attackers to bypass the verification step when using asymmetric keys (RS256, RS384, RS512, ES256, ES384, ES512).
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
